products.name: Apple MacBook Air M3
products.description: The latest MacBook Air featuring the M3 chip, offering a balance of performance, battery life, and design. Ideal for productivity, browsing, and light gaming.

products.name: Acer Swift Go 14
products.description: A budget-friendly laptop with a bright display, comfortable keyboard, and strong performance packaged in a sleek chassis.

products.name: Asus Zenbook 14 OLED (Q425)
products.description: Features a gorgeous OLED display, powerful Intel Core Ultra 7 processor, and almost 16 hours of battery life.

products.name: HP OmniBook Ultra Flip 14 (2024)
products.description: A premium 2-in-1 convertible laptop with a compact design, long battery life, and Intel's Lunar Lake processors for productivity tasks.

products.name: Lenovo ThinkPad T14s (Gen 6, Snapdragon)
products.description: Incredibly long battery life, bright screen, great keyboard, and solid performance with Qualcomm Snapdragon X Elite processor.

products.name: Dell XPS 13 Plus
products.description: A sleek and powerful ultrabook with a stunning 13.4-inch display, Intel Core i7 processor, and a comfortable keyboard.

products.name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 7th Edition
products.description: Features the Snapdragon X Elite chip, offering a balance of performance and portability with a high-resolution touchscreen.

products.name: Asus ROG Strix Scar 17 X3D
products.description: A high-performance gaming laptop with advanced cooling, NVIDIA RTX graphics, and a 17.3-inch high-refresh-rate display.

products.name: MacBook Pro 16 M3 Max
products.description: Designed for creative professionals, featuring the M3 Max chip, a 16-inch Retina display, and exceptional performance.

products.name: Lenovo Yoga Book 9i
products.description: A dual-screen laptop with a versatile design, Intel Core i7 processor, and a unique hinge mechanism for various modes.

products.name: PlayStation 5
products.description: The PlayStation 5 offers a powerful gaming experience with its custom SSD, ray tracing capabilities, and a vast library of exclusive titles.

products.name: Xbox Series X
products.description: The Xbox Series X is the most powerful and fastest gaming console available today, surpassing the PlayStation 5 in technical specifications. It boasts impressive graphics capabilities, native 4K resolution, and ultra-fast load times, along with extensive backward compatibility with games from previous generations.

products.name: Nintendo Switch OLED Model
products.description: The Nintendo Switch OLED Model features a vibrant 7-inch OLED screen, enhanced audio, and a wide adjustable stand, providing an improved handheld gaming experience.

products.name: Xbox Series S
products.description: The Xbox Series S is a compact and affordable console that offers next-gen performance at a lower resolution, ideal for budget-conscious gamers.

products.name: PlayStation 4 Pro
products.description: The PlayStation 4 Pro enhances gaming with 4K resolution and improved performance, supporting a vast library of games.

products.name: Nintendo Switch Lite
products.description: The Nintendo Switch Lite is a handheld-only version of the Switch, offering a compact and lightweight design for gaming on the go.

products.name: Steam Deck
products.description: The Steam Deck is a handheld gaming PC that allows you to play your Steam library on the go, featuring a 7-inch touchscreen and customizable controls.

products.name: PlayStation 5 Digital Edition
products.description: The PlayStation 5 Digital Edition offers the same performance as the standard PS5 but without a disc drive, catering to gamers who prefer digital downloads.

products.name: Xbox One X
products.description: The Xbox One X, released in 2017, is an impressive upgrade from its predecessor, boasting notable enhancements such as 4K graphics, HDR support, and six teraflops of computing power.

products.name: Nintendo Switch 2
products.description: The Nintendo Switch 2, announced in January 2025, features a similar hybrid design to its predecessor with detachable controllers and a TV dock, and is planned for release later in 2025.

products.name: Apple iPhone 16
products.description: The iPhone 16 offers a balance of performance and affordability, featuring the A18 chip, improved battery life, and new AI capabilities.

products.name: Apple iPhone 16 Plus
products.description: The iPhone 16 Plus provides a larger display and extended battery life, making it ideal for users seeking enhanced media consumption.

products.name: Apple iPhone 16 Pro
products.description: The iPhone 16 Pro features a superior camera system with a 5x telephoto lens, catering to photography enthusiasts.

products.name: Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max
products.description: The iPhone 16 Pro Max offers a massive 6.9-inch display and impressive battery life, ideal for users seeking a premium experience.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra
products.description: The Galaxy S25 Ultra boasts a 200MP main camera, Galaxy AI integration, and the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset for top-tier performance.

products.name: Google Pixel 9 Pro
products.description: The Pixel 9 Pro offers advanced AI-based picture-enhancing capabilities, providing users with exceptional photography experiences.

products.name: OnePlus 13
products.description: The OnePlus 13 delivers killer specs at a surprisingly low price, reconnecting with its roots to offer exceptional value.

products.name: Xiaomi 14 Ultra
products.description: The Xiaomi 14 Ultra features a sleek design, powerful performance, and an impressive camera system for photography enthusiasts.

products.name: Oppo Find X8 Pro
products.description: The Oppo Find X8 Pro offers a stunning display, fast charging capabilities, and a versatile camera setup for creative users.

products.name: Google Pixel 9 Pro XL
products.description: The Pixel 9 Pro XL provides a larger display and enhanced battery life, coupled with Google's advanced AI features.

products.name: Apple Watch Series 10
products.description: The Apple Watch Series 10 features a sleek design, advanced health monitoring capabilities, and seamless integration with iOS devices.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch Ultra
products.description: The Galaxy Watch Ultra offers a rugged design, long battery life, and comprehensive fitness tracking features.

products.name: Google Pixel Watch 3
products.description: The Pixel Watch 3 combines elegant design with Google's Wear OS, providing a smooth user experience and extensive app support.

products.name: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds
products.description: The QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds offer immersive audio and high-quality noise cancellation, ideal for music enthusiasts.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM5

products.name: Razer DeathAdder V3 Pro

products.name: HyperX Cloud II Gaming Headset

products.name: Logitech G Pro X Superlight
